item.title: Pedestrianised section of hazelmere road, 16th June
item.description:
Another day, another dumping. This time bagged waste and a kitchen bin. People are treating the area like the Brent dump. Please do something to sort it out in the longer term.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Priory Park Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Fly-tip Medium - Up to medium size van load

item.title: Ongoing litter building up, 16th June
item.description:
Litter building up alongside pathway for many many months. Previously reported last year, cleared but just builds again. Ongoing problem. TFL state it is a council not highways issue. Ideally this area needs cleaning at the same time when the underpass between Leechcroft Avenue and East Rochester Way is cleaned. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): East Rochester Way, Blackfen, London
Report on FixMyStreet
